content.query:
-----Top 10 MOST Sold Products

--- -----ProductRevenue TOP 10 
----DROP VIEW vw_Top10SellingProducts

CREATE VIEW vw_Top10SellingProducts AS
SELECT TOP 10
    P.StockCode,
    P.Description,
    SUM(F.Quantity * F.UnitPrice) AS SOLD_PRODUCTS 
FROM GoldFact_Sales AS F
JOIN GoldDim_Products AS P
    ON F.StockCode = P.StockCode
    WHERE  F.InvoiceNo NOT LIKE 'C%'
GROUP BY P.StockCode, P.Description
ORDER BY SOLD_PRODUCTS DESC;

--SELECT * FROM vw_Top10SellingProducts
